alert.note: Alert for Quay (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 15 at 9:55PM MDT until September 16 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL QUAY AND CENTRAL CURRY COUNTIES... At 955 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Ranchvale, or 20 miles northwest of Clovis, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Ranchvale, Portair, and Cannon Air Force Base. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 383 and 384. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
